full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED DPA' BO GCIG GI SGRUB THABS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(ZHES DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED DPA' BO GCIG PA'I SGRUB THABS 'DI NYID, PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I MDZAD PA'I SGRUB THABS KYI DMIGS GSAL BA RNAMS DES GANG GSUNGS PA LTAR, ,NGAG 'DON 'GA' ZHIG GO BDE BAR BSGRIGS PA 'DI NI GROGS MCHOG DAM PA AER KHE DAR MKHAN GNYER BA'I KHA 'DON DU GNAS LNGA RIG PA'I DZA YA PAndI TA CHEN PO'I BKA' 'BANGS THA SHAL BA BKRA SHIS RNAM RGYAL GYIS RJE NYID KYI GSUNG JI LTA BA BZHIN BSGRIGS SHING BSGYUR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I PHYOGS DUS KUN TU RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
